text: Starcrash is a 1978 American space opera movie directed and co-written by Italian filmmaker Luigi Cozzi, and starring Marjoe Gortner, Caroline Munro, Christopher Plummer, David Hasselhoff and Joe Spinell. It is seen as a "cash- in" and cheap copy of Star Wars. ==References== Category:1978 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1970s English- language movies Category:1978 action movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:Robot movies Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:Italian science fiction movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Movies about royalty
title: Starcrash
